title: Unsung Heroes: Katrine Aalerud on Going from Partying to Racing, Working with Annemiek Van Vleuten
content:
The Norwegian rider started riding to build fitness after partying hard at university, and initially wanted to be a sprinter before turning into a promising climber.

Read the full article at Unsung Heroes: Katrine Aalerud on Going from Partying to Racing, Working with Annemiek Van Vleuten on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
